metadata.synopsis: The Princess of Bormes organizes a convoy to evacuate wounded soldiers from the front lines during World War I, but authorities balk at it until a charming young man smoothes things over.

reviews: The story is not much, but Franju does miracle work in his poetic interpretation of the script that blurs the lines of reality and fiction.
Franju gives the flickering fable a mordant reading, dismay and splendor imprinted in each composition
